config.villagerconfig.title: VillagerConfig Config
config.villagerconfig.maxdiscount.toolti: The highest possible price discount a villager can give on it's default trade price
config.villagerconfig.conversionchance.t: The chance of a villager to converting to a villagerzombie (-1 = vanilla behaviour)
config.villagerconfig.maxraise.tooltip: The highest possible price raise a villager can give on it's default trade price (100 = vanilla, 0 = none)
config.villagerconfig.maxuses.tooltip: Defines how high the max usages should be (100 = vanilla, 200 = 2 x more than vanilla)
config.villagerconfig.tradecycling.toolt: Toggles wherever or not villagers should change their trades when getting reemployed
config.villagerconfig.infiniteTrades.too: If enabled, villagers will never run out of stock
config.villagerconfig.lock.tooltip: Whether or not villagers trades will change, when their workstation is replaced (true = vanilla)
config.villagerconfig.enabled.tooltip: Whether or not https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Trading/Before_Village_%26_Pillage#Mechanics should be used for trade (un)locking
config.villagerconfig.minuses.tooltip: The minimum amount of trades possible after which it can get locked (1.12 default: 2)
config.villagerconfig.maxuses2.tooltip: The maximum amount of trades possible, if reached a trade is guaranteed to get locked (1.12 default: 12)
config.villagerconfig.lockchance.tooltip: The chance of a trade locking itself (1.12 default: 20)
config.villagerconfig.unlockchance.toolt: The chance of a trade unlocking all other trades (1.12 default: 20)
